entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your first post.

entry.title: 为什么我最近没有更新bilibili
entry.content: 最近，我都在忙我的一些github项目，还有花园的项目，没有什么时间更新。我会在近期开几个直播，直播打代码。敬请谅解。

entry.title: [SpigotMC] AsyncKeepAlive
entry.content: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/asynckeepalive.64676/ 站长的新Bukkit插件项目！请大家多多支持。 此插件让玩家的连接更加稳定，即使服务器处于卡顿状态。

entry.title: 【红石音乐】BadApple!
entry.content: https://www.bilibili.com/video/av42236151/ iframe { width: 100vw; margin:0 0 1em; border:0; height: 40.25vw; } function reinitIframe(){ var iframe = document.getElementById(“video”); try{ var bHeight = iframe.contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight; var dHeight = iframe.contentWindow.document.documentElement.scrollHeight; var height = Math.max(bHeight, dHeight); iframe.height = height; console.log(height); }catch (ex){} } window.setInterval(“reinitIframe()”, 2000); 存档链接：https://www.ishland.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/1548919301-BadApple.zip 音频链接：https://www.bilibili.com/audio/au717580?type=1

entry.title: 【Minecraft原版模组系列】长活塞的食用方法
entry.content: Minecraft Java Edition 1.11.2 原版命令方块模组 Extended Pistons 使用方法 https://www.bilibili.com/video/av40830501/ 第一条指令：https://www.ishland.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/extended_pistons_1.1_1_2.txt 第二条指令：https://www.ishland.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/extended_pistons_1.1_2_2.txt

entry.title: [ExplodingTNT]如果钻石弓加入到Minecraft中
entry.content: https://www.bilibili.com/video/av40050735/ iframe { width: 100vw; margin:0 0 1em; border:0; height: 30.25vw; } function reinitIframe(){ var iframe = document.getElementById(“video”); try{ var bHeight = iframe.contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight; var dHeight = iframe.contentWindow.document.documentElement.scrollHeight; var height = Math.max(bHeight, dHeight); iframe.height = height; console.log(height); }catch (ex){} } window.setInterval(“reinitIframe()”, 2000); 转自https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-mk-ySf3SZk If DIAMOND BOWS Were Added to Minecraft There are all sorts of different tools and weapons in Minecraft… but only one bow! What would happen if a DIAMOND bow was added

entry.title: 公网IP那些事
entry.content: 关于给家用宽带获得IPv4公网地址还是比较难的。 目前本站已经运行在一个独享公网ip上。速度不受限于Sakura Frp，速度将会更快。

entry.title: 欢迎来到2019年
entry.content: Ishland的小站站祝大家新年快乐！

entry.title: [Minecraft Animation] 怪物学院 - 瓶子翻转
entry.content: https://www.bilibili.com/video/av39556435/ iframe { width: 100vw; margin:0 0 1em; border:0; height: 30.25vw; } function reinitIframe(){ var iframe = document.getElementById(“video”); try{ var bHeight = iframe.contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight; var dHeight = iframe.contentWindow.document.documentElement.scrollHeight; var height = Math.max(bHeight, dHeight); iframe.height = height; console.log(height); }catch (ex){} } window.setInterval(“reinitIframe()”, 2000); 转自https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n6rH_-jw63I Monster School : BOTTLE FLIP CHALLENGE - Minecraft Animation

entry.title: 网站恢复运行
entry.content: 网站与9:33 CST突然宕机，于10:52 CST切换到备用线路以继续运行。 备用线路可能会发生缓慢现象，这属于正常现象。 现于12:43 CST切回主线 谢谢合作。

entry.title: [bilibili][ExplodingTNT] 当Minecraft死亡时，你会做什么
entry.content: https://www.bilibili.com/video/av39414236/ iframe { width: 100vw; margin:0 0 1em; border:0; height: 30.25vw; } function reinitIframe(){ var iframe = document.getElementById(“video”); try{ var bHeight = iframe.contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight; var dHeight = iframe.contentWindow.document.documentElement.scrollHeight; var height = Math.max(bHeight, dHeight); iframe.height = height; console.log(height); }catch (ex){} } window.setInterval(“reinitIframe()”, 2000); When Minecraft DIES… What Will You Do? Sometimes people comment… “HEY WHAT WILL YOU DO WHEN MINECRAFT DIES???” Well today we get the answer Thanks for watching, hope you enjoyed! Leave your video ideas in the comments if you have any! ALSO HAPPY NEW YEARS!! (almost) - this will be the final video of 2018 😦(

entry.title: 新的小站站
entry.content: Ishland的新站站开放了！ 这个网站是在一台很老的电脑上运行的。运行着Ubuntu 18.10。可能会有一点卡。

entry.title: 世界，您好！
entry.content: 欢迎使用WordPress。这是您的第一篇文章。编辑或删除它，然后开始写作吧！
